message.body: I have to reschedule the medical evaluation bec the documentation I brought for the surgery is unacceptable bec it didn't have the doctor's signature on it.
Good morning OMG they are really strict ! I should had told you sorry
Yea they wouldn't even except a faxed doctor note or anything. Has to be a note with the original signature on it. So I have to wait until I can pick up the note then call to reschedule
Good morning by the way. Lol
Do you need me to pick it up for you?

No I'm just going to see if I can pick it up after work on friday or early mon before my shift begins. Its in jersey but I should be able to manage it without losing more time off. Thank you though, I really appreciate that
No problem FYI future ref they like to see A diagnosis and a prognosis on the Rx
